Configuring DNS

Specify an external DNS server for each Cisco UCS domain to use if the system requires name resolution of hostnames. For example, you cannot use a name such as www.cisco.com when you are configuring a setting on a fabric interconnect.You must use the IP address. In the Configure DNS text box enter the IP address and click Add to configure DNS.

FigureÂ 3-5 DNS

Note You can configure a maximum of four DNS.
